TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThemeDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 實作標記延伸，可讓應用程式作者根據目前的系統主題自訂控制項樣式。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是標記延伸實作。This class is a markup extension implementation. 標記延伸類別存在主要是為了提供基礎結構支援的某些層面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作中，與標記延伸模組所公開的成員不通常稱為從使用者程式碼。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此延伸模組支援[ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md)使用量[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定特定命名慣例的字串設定，以識別哪一個字典適用於特定主題。

span.span: Gets or sets a string setting a particular naming convention to identify which dictionary applies for a particular theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以為標記延伸提供服務的物件。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 這個服務必須能夠提供 的結果。

span.span: This service is expected to provide results for .

summary.span: 傳回物件，這個物件應該設定於套用這個延伸的屬性上。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 如果是 ，這是特定主題字典延伸的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 值。

span.span: For , this is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value for a particular theme dictionary extension.

returns.span: 要在套用延伸的屬性上設定的物件值。

span.span: The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作中，而不是直接呼叫。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作中使用此方法正確處理`ThemeResourceDictionary`物件建立期間的延伸模組值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation. 此實作會依賴服務根據傳入`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 它不得是`null`。It must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`物件必須實作。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement .

exception.span: 您必須在建構期間或使用 方法之前設定這個值。

span.span: You must set this value during construction or before using the method.

exception.span: 為 或未提供 的服務。
